text:
Maggie Cheung Man-yuk (; born 20 September 1964) is a Hong Kong actress.
She is known for her roles in "As Tears Go By", "Center Stage", ', "Green Snake", "The Soong Sisters", "In the Mood for Love", and "Clean".
In 1983, Cheung entered the Miss Hong Kong pageant and won the first runner-up and the Miss Photogenic award as well. She was a semi-finalist in the Miss World pageant the same year.
